name: My resume website
description: The website is my portfolio and resume. It describes my technical and personal skills, presents demo projects developed using various tools, describes my work experience and my contacts.

name: A test assignment from Alpha Ecosystem
description: The page is designed for test work. The page displays a list of products received from FakeApi. The main focus is on the visual representation of the products, each of which is accompanied by an image, name and price. You can add products to favorites, delete them, or add them yourself using the form page. The site has pagination, as well as access to the favorites section. Each of the products has its own page where you can select images to view.

name: The list of seminars. Test task
description: The page is made for test work. The page contains a list of seminars that the site receives using a json server. Seminars in this list can be deleted and edited. When deleting, a modal confirmation window appears, and when editing, a modal window with a form appears.

name: A test assignment from GoszakazGroup
description: The page was created for a test task on HTML layout. Displays a list of news items. The main focus is on the visual representation of the main page, which contains blocks with various articles. Most of the elements have hover animations. The page has an adaptive design.
